title: Hall of Famer Steve 'Mongo' McMichael dies at 67
description: Hall of Fame defensive tackle Steve McMichael, who was diagnosed with ALS in 2021, died Wednesday at the age of 67, the NFL announced.
author: Courtney Cronin

title: Judge delays House settlement over roster limits
description: The judge overseeing the multibillion-dollar settlement has delayed final approval until the deal is modified to address concerns about roster limits.
author: Dan Murphy

title: Rashford or Cunha? Neville and Keane analyse Man Utd's potential options
description: Gary Neville says Manchester United have been desperate for a signing in the mould of Matheus Cunha since letting Marcus Rashford go.

title: Benn gets 18ft ring to ensure Eubank fight 'tear-up'
description: Conor Benn has demanded a small ring for Saturday's showdown with Chris Eubank Jr, to ensure "a tear-up".

title: An inner drive mistaken for laziness: The makings of Van Dijk
description: As Virgil van Dijk prepares to lift his second Premier League title with Liverpool, we look at how the 33-year-old centre-back learned from early setbacks to become one of the best in the world.

title: Flintoff 'thought he had died' in Top Gear crash
description: Cricketer-turned-TV host Andrew "Freddie" Flintoff opens up about his car crash for the first time.

title: JJ Redick says Lakers, Timberwolves expect series to be a 'rock fight'
description: Lakers head coach JJ Redick feels that his team's first-round playoff series against the Timberwolves could continue to be a physical and chippy one.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 11 - Paul Arizin (1950-62)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Arizin wore only jersey No. 11 and put up 22.8 points, 8.6 rebounds, and 2.3 assists per game.
